title: Learning from Open Hardware: DevOps and Continuous Integration for the Production of Big Stuff
abstract: What is Missing to Prototype and Make Big Machines, Cars, Trucks, Spaceships Really Fast?
description: Continuous Integration was a big buzzword with software projects already years ago. In projects as our Open Hardware Pocket Science Lab we take the idea of Development Operations a step further and apply these concepts to hardware. The increased speed of development and production with a click almost feels like automatic deployment. What are the next steps to apply this to industrial machine production and solve problems of our times such as the lack of sustainable development?
